title: 澳洲媒体9 new发假新闻？
contents:
微博上看到的，香港人在澳洲的集会，记者采访一名大学学生，学生说"Some aggressive people from Hong Kong just trying to fake things up such as Chinese government is hurting Hong Kong people. That's ridiculous." 结果最后新闻视频只截取了"Chinese government is hurting Hong Kong people. That's ridiculous." 

这是真的吗？好像没法求证，视频看不出来。
这个9 news是个什么来头？

https://m.weibo. cn/detail/4406592307194926
